dc_title_s: Colton's map of the United States, the Canadas & c : showing the rail roads, canals & stage roads with distances from place to place
dc_description_s: Printed by D. McLellan.; Inset maps of New England and eastern New York; United States and Central America; the Isthmus of Panama showing the routes of travel between Chagres and Panama.|62 x 73 centimeters|Scale approximately 1:3,801,600|General Map Collection
